lyrics.text: Lesson 24. It could be worse. First listen and then answer the question. Had the right
lyrics.translation: 第24课。情况可能会更糟。首先听录音，然后回答问题。右边的

lyrics.text: of money been stolen? I entered the hotel manager's office and sat down. I had just
lyrics.translation: 钱被偷了吗？我走进酒店经理的办公室坐了下来。我刚刚

lyrics.text: lost 50 pounds and I felt very upset. I left the money in my room, I said, and it's not
lyrics.translation: 我瘦了50磅，感觉非常沮丧。我把钱留在房间里了，我说，它不在那儿了。

lyrics.text: there now. The manager was sympathetic, but he could do nothing. Everyone's losing money
lyrics.translation: 现在好了。经理表示同情，但他无能为力。每个人都在亏钱

lyrics.text: these days, he said. He started to complain about this wicked world, but was interrupted
lyrics.translation: 这些天，他说。他开始抱怨这个邪恶的世界，但是被打断了

lyrics.text: by a knock at the door. A girl came in and put an envelope on his desk. It contained
lyrics.translation: 被敲门声打断。一个女孩走了进来，把一个信封放在他的桌子上。里面包含了

lyrics.text: 50 pounds. I found this outside this gentleman's room, she said. Well, I said to the manager,
lyrics.translation: 50英镑。她说，我是在这位先生的房间外发现的。好吧，我对经理说，

lyrics.text: There is still some honesty in this world.
lyrics.translation: 这个世界上还有诚实存在。
